sentences.sContent: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.sCn: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.sContent: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.sCn: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.sContent: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.sCn: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.sContent: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.sCn: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.sContent: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.sCn: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。
国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.sContent: the downward trend in the price of gold
Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.sCn: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

sentences.sContent: ...But the data is exact enough for a clear trend to be easily discernible...
...It is a trend that shows no sign of slowing...

...This case gives the court an opportunity to rein in the growing use of patents to protect genetically engineered crops and other life forms-but the court may well use it to give this trend a powerful new endorsement...
...The recent trend toward early decision and early action among selective colleges and universities has pushed the traditional deadline of January up to Nov...
...becoming certified is a trend among today's job seeking youth...
...is the “certification craze” just a trend that will eventually pass...
...The newer trend is to start recruiting poor and non-white students as early as the seventh grade...
...This trend results in emergency rooms being overwhelmed with patients without regular doctors...
...has found a similar trend among black Caribbean immigrants...

phrases.pCn: 共同趋势；总趋向，总走向

trans.tranOther: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing
